body: The builder sets the Perception and Disable Device DCs for a mechanical trap. For a magic trap, the values depend on the highest-level spell used.
name: Perception and Disable Device DCs
url: pfsrd://Core Rulebook/Rules/Environment/Traps/Elements of a Trap/Perception and Disable Device DCs

sections.body: The base DC for both Perception and Disable Device checks is 20. Raising or lowering either of these DCs affects the CR (Table: CR Modifiers for Mechanical Traps).
sections.url: pfsrd://Core Rulebook/Rules/Environment/Traps/Elements of a Trap/Perception and Disable Device DCs/Mechanical Trap
sections.name: Mechanical Trap

sections.body: The DC for both Perception and Disable Device checks is equal to 25 + the spell level of the highest-level spell used. Only characters with the trapfinding class feature can attempt a Disable Device check involving a magic trap.
sections.url: pfsrd://Core Rulebook/Rules/Environment/Traps/Elements of a Trap/Perception and Disable Device DCs/Magic Trap
sections.name: Magic Trap
